name: 陳正中
objective:
探討工作研究涵蓋之各項技術：時間研究、動作研究、程序分析、作業分析、影片分析、工作抽查、標準工時與效率管理、動作經濟原理、生產線平衡、生產力衡量等。
The purpose of this course is to provide students with a resource which describes the techniques and procedures of motion and time study .It contains: techniques of methods study, work station design, PTS, stop watch time study, standard data, assembly line balancing.
schedule:
WK#1 Introduction to work study
WK#2 Problem-solving tools
WK#3 Operation analysis
WK#4 Manual work design
WK#5 Workplace, equipment and tool design
WK#6 Work environment design
WK#7 Design of cognitive work
WK#8 Work place and system safety
WK# 9 Midterm exam
WK#10 Time study
WK#11 Rating and allowance
WK#12 Standard data and formulas
WK#13 Predetermined time systems
WK#14 Indirect and expense labor standards 
WK#15 Standards follow-up and use
WK#16 Wage payment
WK#17 Training and other management practices
WK#18 Final exam
scorePolicy:
Homework 10%
Quiz 20%
Midterm exam 25%
Final exam 25%
Team projects 20%
materials: Andris Freivalds and Benjamin Niebel (2014). Niebel’s Methods, Standards, & Work Design (13th ed.). McGraw Hill, New York. (東華書局 / 新月圖書代理)
